readme:
# QCxMS Spectra Prediction from SDF Workflow

This workflow predicts electron ionization (EI) mass spectra using QCxMS, starting from a single SDF file containing the 3D coordinates of all atoms in the molecule. These files can typically be obtained from PubChem. The workflow converts the input file, performs neutral and production runs, and generates predicted spectra in MSP format.

## Workflow Steps

1. **Input SDF File**:
   - Accepts an SDF file containing one or multiple molecular structures with pre-generated conformers.

2. **Conversion to XYZ Format**:
   - Converts the input SDF file to XYZ format using Open Babel.

3. **QCxMS Neutral Run**:
   - Performs a neutral run to prepare the molecular structure for production calculations.

4. **QCxMS Production Run**:
   - Executes the production run to simulate fragmentation and generate intermediate results.

5. **QCxMS Get Results**:
   - Processes the results from the production run and generates the predicted EI mass spectra in MSP format.

## Inputs

- **Input SDF File**: A file containing molecular structures with 3D coordinates (e.g., obtained from PubChem).

## Outputs

- **Predicted Spectra**:
  - An MSP file containing the predicted EI mass spectra for the input molecules.

## Usage

This workflow is designed to be run on the Galaxy platform. Users can upload their SDF file, configure parameters, and execute the workflow to obtain predicted EI mass spectra.

## References

- [QCxMS Documentation](https://github.com/recetox/qcxms)
- [Open Babel Documentation](http://openbabel.org/)

## License

This workflow is distributed under the MIT License. Please ensure proper attribution when using or modifying this workflow.
changelog:
# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/), 
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1] - 2025-04-28

### Added
- Initial version of the QCxMS Spectra Prediction from SDF Workflow.
- Support for input SDF files containing molecular structures with 3D coordinates.
- Conversion of SDF files to XYZ format using Open Babel.
- QCxMS neutral and production runs for EI mass spectra prediction.
- Output of predicted spectra in MSP format.
diagrams:
# Workflow diagrams

## QCxMS Spectra Prediction from SDF

```mermaid
graph LR
0["ℹ️ Input SDF File"]@{ shape: doc }
1["Conversion to XYZ format"]@{ shape: process }
0 --> 1
2["QCxMS neutral run"]@{ shape: process }
1 --> 2
3["QCxMS production run"]@{ shape: process }
2 --> 3
2 --> 3
2 --> 3
4["QCxMS get results"]@{ shape: process }
1 --> 4
3 --> 4
```
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1100 480" role="img" aria-label="QCxMS Spectra Prediction from SDF workflow diagram">
  <title>QCxMS Spectra Prediction from SDF</title>
  <desc>Quantum chemistry EI mass spectra prediction pipeline: SDF to XYZ conversion, neutral molecular dynamics run, production fragmentation run, and spectrum assembly.</desc>

  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <rect width="1100" height="480" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1100" height="480" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>

  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1100" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">QCxMS Spectra Prediction from SDF</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->
  <!-- Input SDF -> Convert to XYZ -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 145 C 230 145, 250 170, 290 170"/>
  <!-- Convert to XYZ -> Neutral Run -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 490 170 C 530 170, 530 170, 570 170"/>
  <!-- Neutral Run -> Production Run -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 770 170 C 810 170, 810 170, 850 170"/>
  <!-- Convert to XYZ -> Get Results (secondary, for molecule info) -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 390 215 C 390 310, 850 310, 850 310"/>
  <!-- Production Run -> Get Results -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 770 170 C 810 170, 810 290, 850 290"/>
  <!-- Get Results -> Predicted Spectra output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 850 300 C 890 300, 900 300, 960 300"/>

  <!-- Production Run -> Fragments output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 770 195 C 810 195, 910 210, 960 210"/>

  <!-- INPUT NODES -->
  <!-- Input SDF File -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0, 100)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Input SDF File</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">3D molecular</text>
    <text x="90" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">structures</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING NODES -->
  <!-- Convert to XYZ -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(290, 125)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Convert SDF to XYZ</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">OpenBabel format</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">conversion + SMILES</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- QCxMS Neutral Run -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(570, 125)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">QCxMS Neutral Run</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Equilibrium MD</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">trajectory sampling</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- QCxMS Production Run -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(570, 255)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">QCxMS Production Run</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">EI fragmentation</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">simulation</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- QCxMS Get Results -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(850, 255)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">QCxMS Get Results</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Assemble predicted</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">mass spectra</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- OUTPUT NODES -->
  <!-- Predicted Spectra -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(960, 175)">
    <rect width="120" height="50" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="120" height="24" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="12" width="120" height="12" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="60" y="17" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Predicted Spectra</text>
    <text x="60" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">MSP format</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Fragments -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(960, 105)">
    <rect width="120" height="50" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="120" height="24" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="12" width="120" height="12" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="60" y="17" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Fragments</text>
    <text x="60" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Fragment results</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- LEGEND -->
  <g transform="translate(20, 420)">
    <rect width="1060" height="45" rx="6" fill="white" fill-opacity="0.85" stroke="#dee2e6"/>
    <rect x="15" y="15" width="14" height="14" rx="3" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="35" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Input</text>
    <line x1="100" y1="22" x2="150" y2="22" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="158" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="260" y1="22" x2="310" y2="22" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="318" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">QC / secondary</text>
    <rect x="440" y="15" width="14" height="14" rx="3" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="460" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Output</text>
    <rect x="530" y="15" width="14" height="14" rx="3" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="550" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Processing</text>
  </g>
</svg>
